title: Hour 1 - LIV Tour Pursuing Sir Charles, Deshaun Watson Update
itunes:title: Hour 1 - LIV Tour Pursuing Sir Charles, Deshaun Watson Update
description:
Dan addresses the reports that the LIV Tour wants to poach Charles Barkley and also gives an update on the current status of Deshaun Watson and the anticipated NFL discipline.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
